dict.string:
TM_SVN="${TM_SVN:=svn}" FORMAT_LOG="${TM_BUNDLE_PATH}/Tools/format_log.rb" TM_SVN_LOG_RANGE="${TM_SVN_LOG_RANGE:=BASE:1}"
if [[ -z $TM_SELECTED_FILES ]]; then "$TM_SVN" log -vr"$TM_SVN_LOG_RANGE" "$TM_FILEPATH" 2>&1| ruby -- "$FORMAT_LOG" else eval "$TM_SVN" log -vr"$TM_SVN_LOG_RANGE" $TM_SELECTED_FILES 2>&1| ruby -- "$FORMAT_LOG" fi
